SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.id) FROM hm_product p JOIN hm_recommendation pr ON pr.target_product_id = p.id JOIN hm_offer o ON o.product_id = p.id JOIN hm_offer_price op ON op.offer_id = o.id WHERE p.tenant = #{tenantId} AND p.state_id = 'ACTIVE' AND o.state_id = 'ACTIVE' AND (op.sale_end_date IS NULL OR op.sale_end_date >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
AND pr.source_product_id = #{sourceProductId}
